roleset.name: to move or cause to move
roleset.note: WHISK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'whisk' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from whisk.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Visitors]-2 , [*-2]-1 whisked [*]-1 from the Strip on a moving walkway , will glide over a habitat for rare white tigers , which [*T*-1] will star in performances by the famed illusionist team of Siegfried & Roy .
